description.zh: CodeX Docs 是一款基于 Editor.js 生态系统的免费开源文档应用，适用于创建产品文档、团队知识库或个人笔记。它提供现代化的内容编辑体验，界面简洁且支持移动端。该应用支持静态渲染，无需数据库即可轻松部署，并集成了分析和错误追踪功能。
description.en: CodeX Docs is a free, open-source documentation application built on the Editor.js ecosystem, designed for creating and managing product documentation, team knowledge bases, or personal notes. It offers modern content editing capabilities with a clean, mobile-friendly interface. The app supports static rendering, easy deployment without databases, and integrates analytics and error tracking tools.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 无需数据库或复杂依赖，部署简单快捷
- 支持多种部署方式（Docker、Kubernetes、Yarn），灵活高效
- 用户界面高度可定制，适配不同使用场景
- SEO友好的URL设计，提升内容可发现性和用户体验

## 功能列表:

- 基于 Editor.js 生态系统，支持富文本内容编辑
- 支持文档嵌套结构，便于灵活组织内容
- 静态渲染，提升性能与安全性
- 响应式设计，兼容桌面端与移动端
- 页面URL简洁易读，利于SEO
- 集成 Hawk 错误监控系统
- 支持将错别字反馈至 Slack 或 Telegram
- 内置 Yandex Metrica 分析工具
- 配置与部署流程简单
- 可自定义UI，如折叠章节、隐藏侧边栏等
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- No database or complex dependencies required for deployment
- Fast and simple setup with multiple deployment options (Docker, Kubernetes, Yarn)
- Highly customizable UI to fit different user preferences
- SEO-friendly URLs enhance discoverability and user experience

## Features:

- Powered by the Editor.js ecosystem for rich content editing
- Supports nested document structures for flexible organization
- Static rendering for improved performance and security
- Responsive design that works well on both desktop and mobile devices
- Human-readable, SEO-friendly page URLs
- Integrated error tracking via Hawk
- Misprint reporting to Slack or Telegram
- Built-in integration with Yandex Metrica for analytics
- Easy configuration and deployment process
- Customizable UI options such as collapsible sections and sidebar visibility control
